content.html:
would be nice to define the arguments of this boost function. We could paste from the .cc file:

/// \param[in] float1 Input velocity.
/// \param[in] float2 Input torque.
/// \param[in] ActuatorProperties Static properties of this actuator
/// \return Torque according to the model.

We could also consider defining an ActuatorState class, if we wanted to consider position as well as velocity. Then the function could have two arguments.
